txt.en:
[placeholder],

A recent discovery made me think of you, the talents you have, and the manner in which you comport yourself. This will require you to have your thoughts in very rigid order. Visit me and bring this letter to let me know that you are truly interested.

Dalton Willow
'It is good that you came so quickly. I had thought your foolish notions of travelling would win out over reason. Enough discussion... we must set you to the task.'
You received a letter from your trainer in Bree-town asking for you to return to him. Apparently, there is something that he wishes to teach you.
Bring the letter to Dalton Willow in Bree
Dalton Willow sent you a letter requesting that you visit him in Bree.\n\nDeliver the letter to Dalton Willow. He can be found at the Scholar's Stair in Bree.
